00024 class cComponent;

00034 typedef int simsignal_t;
00035 
00036 #define SIMSIGNAL_NULL   ((simsignal_t)-1)

00049 class SIM_API cIListener
00050 {
00051     friend class cComponent; // for subscribecount
00052     friend class cResultFilter; // for subscribecount
00053   private:
00054     int subscribecount;
00055   public:
00056     cIListener();
00057     virtual ~cIListener();
00058 
00071     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, long l) = 0;
00072 
00074     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, unsigned long l) = 0;
00075 
00077     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, double d) = 0;
00078 
00080     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, const SimTime& t) = 0;
00081 
00083     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, const char *s) = 0;
00084 
00086     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, cObject *obj) = 0;
00087 
00095     virtual void finish(cComponent *component, simsignal_t signalID) {}
00096 
00102     virtual void subscribedTo(cComponent *component, simsignal_t signalID) {}
00103 
00119     virtual void unsubscribedFrom(cComponent *component, simsignal_t signalID) {}
00120 
00124     int getSubscribeCount() const  { return subscribecount; }
00125 };
00126 
00135 class SIM_API cListener : public cIListener
00136 {
00137   protected:
00139     virtual void unsupportedType(simsignal_t signalID, const char *dataType);
00140   public:
00141     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, long l);
00142     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, unsigned long l);
00143     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, double d);
00144     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, const SimTime& t);
00145     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, const char *s);
00146     virtual void receiveSignal(cComponent *source, simsignal_t signalID, cObject *obj);
00147 };
